title: Stamp of approval
creator_credit: Raymond Garceau, Michael Spencer and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A long history of research and development means that agricultural produce has attained a high standard. The government program of testing and surveillance maintains quality control, and gives the world market confidence in Canadian products.
